modName: Blacksmiths Guild - Wicked Ones Witcher Armour Collection
summary: Adds crafting and improving of Wicked Ones Witcher Armour Collection to its own custom forge in the Blacksmiths\' Guild Cavern - no more crafting menu clutter!
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=yellow][size=+2]Wicked Ones Witcher Armour Collection at The Blacksmiths\' Guild[/color][/size]


[color=orange][size=+1]*****Eliminates crafting menu clutter by placing items into their own exclusive forge*****[/color][/size]


[color=red][size=+1]*****This mod is a crafting .esp only and contains no armour meshes/textures!!!!***** [/color][/size][/center]

[size=+1]How does it work?[/size] 

[color=orange][size=+1]1)[/color][/size] Download/Install/NMM Blacksmiths\' Guild Core Mod
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17524] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17524[/url]

[color=orange][size=+1]2)[/color][/size] Download/Install/NMM from Witcher 2 - Viper Assassin-Blue Stripes-Roche-Ves 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7807] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7807[/url]
- Craftable Blue Stripes Commando Armor vBETA
- Craftable Blue Stripes Elite Armor v1-1
- Craftable Viper Assassin Armor v0-9

[color=orange][size=+1]3)[/color][/size] Download/Install/NMM the SG_WickedBlueStripes file from this page here . . . the one you\'re on now . . . 

[color=orange][size=+1]4)[/color][/size] De-activate/Uncheck Wicked\'s files
- TH3WICK3D1-BlueStripesCommandoArmor.esp 
- TH3WICK3D1-BlueStripesEliteArmor.esp
- TH3WICK3D1-ViperAssassinArmor.esp 
this step will: 
-	keep Wicked\'s meshes/textures \'in the background\'
-	eliminate the mis-matched material types/stats from the original file

[color=orange][size=+1]5)[/color][/size] Confirm my SG_WickedBlueStripes.esp is Activated/Checked
this step will:
-	allow my .esp to access Wicked\'s meshes/textures
-	add Wicked\'s Armours to Wicked\'s Forge at the Blacksmiths\' Guild
-	distribute Wicked\'s Armours across three crafting categories 
---	Blue Stripes Commando - Light - Elven
---              Blue Stripes Commando - Heavy - Steel Plate
---              Viper Assassin - Light - Scaled
---              Blue Stripes Elite - Light - Glass
-	add a light sprinkling of Wicked\'s Armours to the Bandit and Bandit Boss levelled lists
-                add Wicked\'s version of Roche\'s (enchanted) necklace to the levelled lists

----------------------------------

[size=+1][color=orange]Change Log:[/size][/color]
V.1.02 - Corrected Perk designation errors for Blue Stripes Commando (Light Armour/Elven) and Viper Assassin Hood (May 28, 2012) - thanks to Luckysneak for pointing it out!!!  My bad!!!!
V.1.01 - Added Viper Assassin Armour (May 25, 2012)
V.1.00 - Original upload with Blue Stripes Commando and Elite Armours (May 25, 2012)

----------------------------------

[size=+1][color=orange]PERMISSIONS[/size][/color]

The Wicked One is the owner of the intellectual property for porting the assets presented here - I only added the \'crafting/improving.\' 

Feel free to open up my .esp and play with it for your own [i]personal use[/i]; [u]do not[/u] re-upload anything, anywhere, without a PM to me to discuss first.

Check with The Wicked One for any queries about the meshes/textures.

-------------------------------------------

[size=+1][color=orange]CREDITS[/size][/color]

The Wicked One - this really is The Wicked One\'ss port!!!
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7807]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7807[/url]

The Wicked One - thanks for the \'okay\' to mess with your stuff . . .

Meshes and textures belong to CDProjektRED, the developer of The Witcher 2 [url=http://www.thewitcher.com]http://www.thewitcher.com[/url]
The game [b]ROCKS![/b] - give it a buy, give it a try . . .
author: NordHammer
